channel.title: Like bricks in the sky - talks

item.title: “Adding Two-Factor Authentication to Django (with django-allauth)” Lightning Talk
item.description: A bit late on this article, but better late than never! Back on October 27th, 2016 I gave a talk at Django Boston entitled “Adding Two-Factor Authentication to Django (with django-allauth)”. It was a ~20 minute talk on integrating the django-allauth-2fa package into a Django project. The package (which I …
item.dc:creator: Patrick Cloke
